desc: This method deletes a message from a channel.

ts.desc: Timestamp of the message to be deleted.

channel.desc: Channel containing the message to be deleted.

errors.message_not_found: No message exists with the requested timestamp.
errors.channel_not_found: Value passed for channel was invalid.
errors.cant_delete_message: Authenticated user does not have permission to delete this message.
errors.compliance_exports_prevent_deletion: Compliance exports are on, messages can not be deleted
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
